sources.title: Fish Follies (1940)
sources.description: Scrappy visits an aquarium, where a uniformed docent tells him about the cartoon fish. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/fish-follies-1940/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy visits an aquarium, where a uniformed docent tells him about the cartoon fish, with many a pun.Scrappy only has one line in this cartoon; his presence is bring in the audience for the character, who was now in his ninth and final year. The docent is voiced by Mel Blanc, who does a voice midway between Sylvester the Cat and Jerry Colonna, as he rambles on about stewed clams reeling out of a saloon, and carps directing traffic. Theyre traffic carps, get it?That's about it for this one. There are a few puns that are funny the first time, if you haven't beat the carp to the punchline.
